General.Name: Belships
General.Description: Belships ASA owns and operates dry bulk ships worldwide. It operates through Own Ships, Lighthouse Naviagtion, and Ship Management segments. The company operates a fleet of 34 Supra/Ultramax bulk carriers. It also provides commercial and ship management, technical, crewing, port agency, and logistical services. The company was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

3.Name: Mr. Jøel  Baardson
3.Title: Managing Director of Elkem Chartering AS

6.Name: Mr. Ye Zhan Hua
